title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.1 - Permanent books of account or records and contents of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and other forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.1 - Permanent books of account or records and contents of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and other forms

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 14(a) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-111(a)
(a) Every
person subject to City of Yonkers earnings tax on nonresidents or liable for
the collection thereof, and any person required to file a return of information
with respect to earnings, must keep such permanent books of account or records
as are sufficient to establish the amount of net earnings from self-employment
and other matters required to be shown by such person in any City of Yonkers
earnings tax return or such return of information. (b) The State Tax Commission is authorized to
prescribe the contents and form of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, documents and statements, and may require the inclusion therein of any
information, including identifying numbers, it deems necessary for the proper
enforcement of article 30-B of the Tax Law and article X of the Codes and

Ordinances of the City of Yonkers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
267.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
